settings.title: Professional Power Tools for Margate's Building Trade
settings.paragraph_1: Margate's remarkable regeneration — from the Turner Contemporary wave along the seafront to the revival of the Old Town's independent quarter — has brought a surge of construction and renovation work to the area. Invicta Tools at our Ramsgate branch is just 10 minutes down the A254, putting professional power tools and trade supplies within easy reach for Margate's growing community of tradespeople.
settings.paragraph_2: The mix of Victorian terraces, art-deco seafront properties and modern conversions in Margate demands a versatile toolkit. We stock the full Makita LXT and XGT ranges alongside DeWalt's 18V and FlexVolt platforms — everything from compact impact drivers for second-fix work to rotary hammers for structural renovation. Our Ramsgate trade counter carries it all.
settings.paragraph_3: Margate builders tell us they value having a proper trade supplier nearby rather than relying on online deliveries that might not arrive on time. Come in, handle the tools, get expert advice, and leave with exactly what you need. Free delivery on orders over £30 to all CT9 postcodes if you'd rather order online.

settings.title: Need Tools in Margate?
settings.subtitle: Call our Ramsgate branch for expert advice, or shop online with free delivery over £30.
